game.name: Crystal Adopts a Bunny
game.description:
Crystal Adopts a Bunny is an awesome animals game meant for providing unlimited fun and entertainment to both girls and boys. In this free online animal game, you will have to help Crystal take care of the cute lost bunny she has recently met in the woods area. The problem is that she is quite confused how to clean and feed him. Hope you have the sufficient skills to accept this challenge and help the girl get relaxed when it comes to providing a complete care to the lost bunny.  

Your job in this cute animal game for girls is to clean bunny and also feed him with some good carrots. Also dress up Crystal and bunny with the help of some matching outfits. You are free to choose your favorite items to make them look smart. This sweet little girl has adopted him and now become very crazy for it. Use water and soap to wash him properly. Then move forward and blow dry its fur to get him relaxed. Once it is done, you are advised to arrange some food like fresh carrots to satisfy his hungry tummy.  

After having food, bunny will get ready to have fun with Crystal and you. Dress up both of them to complete the goal of this brand new animal game. Give her a long haircut or leave her hair with a bob cut or put her hair in two space buns. Also use a scarf to tie Crystals hair. You can use a yellow sweater having pineapple prints to dress her up. Also select from a purple skirt with a bow, a yellow blouse, pink pants, a white and blue striped t-shirt, a black scarf around her neck or a pair of jeans. Complete her outfit with a blue necklace or other golden accessories in this cool html5 game. Opt for a gentleman outfit, or a princess one for the bunny. Play it now and enjoy this game in your browser kids!
